about_the_game:
In order to launch the mod make sure that Steam version of original Return to Castle Wolfenstein is installed


RealRTCW is an overhaul mod for critically acclaimed Wolfenstein classic. It features improved visuals, expanded arsenal, rebalanced gunplay and proper modern systems support!

Technical upgrades:
  • Proper widescreen support (iortcw)
  • OpenAL sound API support - better sound quality (iortcw)
  • Steam Workshop integration
  • Steam Achievements
  • Steam Rich Presence
  • Subtitles support

Visual and audible improvements:
  • HD weapon models
  • New weapon animations
  • HQ textures for the environment and characters
  • Overhauled sound effects
  • Atmospheric effects support - rain and snow
  • New modular HUD and UI

Gameplay changes(most of them optional):
  • Expanded arsenal
  • New enemy types
  • New inventory items
  • Rewards system for finding secret areas
  • Overhauled gunplay
  • Rebalanced AI
  • Bonus game modes for more challenge
  • Difficulty levels overhaul - it affects everything now
  • Realism difficulty level
  • Free roam interactive hub - Malta HQ

content_descriptors.notes: This Mod contains content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence and Gore, General Mature Content

RealRTCW is a free modification for Return to Castle Wolfenstein.
RealRTCW is based on Return to Castle Wolfenstein single player GNU GPL Source Code.
Store art based on original game promo arts made by TODD HART DESIGN for ID Software.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: AMD Phenom(tm) II X4 965 Processor or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3-D Hardware Accelerator (with 512MB VRAM with full OpenGL® support)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Return to Castle Wolfenstein required to play
